pages.text: $(li)The Silk Touch enchantment can be applied in any kind of $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_pickaxe)Pickaxe$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_shovel)Shovel$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)Axe$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_hoe)Hoe$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)Pickarang$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/flamarang)Flamarang$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/shears)Shears$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment allows fragile blocks as $(l:patchouli:decoration/others/glass)Glass$(/l) to be collected by the enchanted tool.
pages.title: Silk Touch
